Description.Text: Aparthotel Comfort is an elegant 3-star superior property offering chic accommodation near the heart of Minsk. Highlights include a nearby sports complex, contemporary design and good transport links. Minsk is the capital city of Belarus and a major cultural centre with a rich and fascinating history. Nearby places of interest include Michalova and the National Opera and Ballet of Belarus. Hrusauka metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Minsk destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise property. Facilities include a nearby sports complex. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Studio apartments are 38sqm and decorated in a bright, elegant style with contemporary furniture. They feature a well-equipped kitchenette and small sitting area. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, work desk and en-suite bathroom. A continental breakfast is provided every morning. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and concierge service. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
